text: Impressive! Though it seems the drag feature could be improved. But overall it looks incredible. Youâ€™ve nailed the design and the responsiveness at various breakpoints works really well.

Woah, your project looks awesome! How long have you been coding for? I'm still new, but think I want to dive intro React as well soon. Perhaps you can give me an insight on where I can learn React? Thanks!

replies.text: If you're still new, I'd recommend focusing on the fundamentls of HTML, CSS, and JS before considering React. It's very tempting to jump ahead but lay a solid foundation first.
I couldn't agree more with this. Everything moves so fast and it always seems like everyone knows the newest library/framework. But the fundamentals are what stay constant.
